title: Did you know this secret of Lua functions? #short

automation_approach: Linter-style transformation that adds explicit ipairs() or pairs() calls to loops for developers who prioritize cross-version Lua compatibility or readability.

title: Did you know this secret of Lua functions? #short
problem: Architectural uncertainty regarding when to use variadic functions (...) vs. passing a single table/list.
automation_approach: Analyze function calls across a codebase; if a variadic function is frequently called with a high number of arguments, an agent can recommend refactoring the signature to a single table object for better readability and maintainability.

automation_approach: A script that calculates the collective bounding box of a selection and adjusts the Size and CFrame of individual parts based on a single-axis multiplier.

title: Why Roblox Studio is Confusing For Beginners
problem: Difficulty aligning and snapping parts together (walls not lining up) during the building process.
automation_approach: A command-bar utility to snap the CFrame of a part to the nearest grid increment or the face of another targeted part.

title: Why Roblox Studio is Confusing For Beginners
problem: Confusion over Luau syntax patterns like 'for i, v in pairs', Enums, and error handling (pcall).
automation_approach: Translating natural language intent into boilerplate-free Luau code while providing inline explanations of iteration and error-catching logic.
